section.name: Description of the module expressionmatrix.js
section.p: This module contains functions to handle ExpressionMatrix objects.

section.name: Creation functions
Read functions
Write functions
section.source:
/* * Write a expression matrix * @param em Expression matrix to write * @param file File to write * @translator Translator to use * @return nothing */ function writeExpressionMatrix(em, file, translator);
/* * Write a expression matrix at the standford format * @param em Expression matrix to write * @param file File to write * @translator Translator to use * @return nothing */ function writeStandfordExpressionMatrix(em, file, translator);
